com.st.st25sdk.type2

Class ReservedAreaType2Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type2.ReservedAreaType2Configuration

  • public class ReservedAreaType2Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods to handle Reseved Area Configuration based on Memory Control TLV informations of a NFC Forum Type2 tag

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReservedAreaType2Configuration(ControlTlv memoryControlTlv)
      Constructor for a MemoryControlTlvType2Configuration object Used to define Rsvd_Area as defined in NFCForum-TS-T2T-1.0 specification document

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Getter for first byte address for the Reserved Area
      int getRaSize()
      Getter for number of bytes for the Reserved Area
